question: Sharing microwave with non-muslims to warm-up food
answer:
QUESTION
I work with non-muslims and all the employess in our company are non-muslims. During lunch break, I warm up my food (lunch) in the same microwave oven that everybody uses. I'm sure some of them eat pork and it is quite possible that some of the vapours of the food containing pork may be left behind after they use the microwave. I usually keep the microwave door open for sometime so that all the vapours are removed from the microwave. Please let me know if I it is alright to use the microwave oven for warming up my food. Jazakallah
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to share a microwave with non-Muslims. It is advisable to
wipe the oven before using it.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
